titleStmt.title: Londons disease, and cure: being a soveraigne receipt against the plague, for prevention sake. / By John Qvarles, philo-medicus.
titleStmt.author: Quarles, John, 1624-1665.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edward Crowch, dwelling on Snow-hill,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "THere's none so ignorant, I hope, but knowes ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
